example_flow.name: Order Status Inquiry
example_flow.description: Automatically handle customer inquiries about order status

actions.message: Thank you for contacting us. I'll help you check your order status.

expected_guidance.name: Order Status Inquiry
expected_guidance.content:
Automatically handle customer inquiries about order status

**Conditions:**
1. message_contains: order status
2. channel: email

**Actions:**
1. send_response: Thank you for contacting us. I'll help you check your order status.
2. add_tag: order-inquiry

**Triggers:**
1. new_message
